parameters.query:
WITH payload AS (
  SELECT
    {{$json.source_id}}::int AS source_id,
    '{{ JSON.stringify($json.chunks_json) }}'::jsonb AS chunks_json
),
expanded AS (
  SELECT
    payload.source_id,
    COALESCE((chunk.value->>'chunk_index')::int, chunk.ordinality::int) AS chunk_index,
    GREATEST(1, COALESCE((chunk.value->>'page_number')::int, 1)) AS page_number,
    NULLIF(chunk.value->>'content', '') AS content,
    CASE
      WHEN chunk.value ? 'embedding' AND jsonb_typeof(chunk.value->'embedding') = 'array'
      THEN (
        SELECT ARRAY_AGG(elem.value::float8 ORDER BY elem.ordinality)
        FROM jsonb_array_elements(chunk.value->'embedding') WITH ORDINALITY AS elem(value, ordinality)
      )::vector
      ELSE NULL::vector
    END AS embedding
  FROM payload
  CROSS JOIN LATERAL jsonb_array_elements(payload.chunks_json) WITH ORDINALITY AS chunk(value, ordinality)
),
deleted AS (
  DELETE FROM kb_chunks WHERE source_id = {{$json.source_id}} RETURNING 1
),
inserted AS (
  INSERT INTO kb_chunks (source_id, chunk_index, page_number, content, embedding)
  SELECT
    source_id,
    chunk_index,
    page_number,
    content,
    embedding
  FROM expanded
  ORDER BY chunk_index
  RETURNING chunk_index
),
summary AS (
  SELECT
    {{$json.source_id}}::int AS source_id,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expanded) AS chunk_count,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expanded) AS ok_chunks,
    0 AS error_chunks
)
SELECT
  summary.source_id,
  summary.chunk_count,
  summary.ok_chunks,
  summary.error_chunks,
  {{$json.chunk_text_length || 0}}::int AS text_length
FROM summary;
